resources.string: Enter a starting value, and convert to the desired temperature unit.
Purpose: To enable the average user to easily and efficiently convert common kitchen related measurements to a different unit.

How to Use the Kitchen Buddy: 
 1. Select the starting unit. 
 2. Enter the starting value. 
 3. Select the unit to be converted to. 
 4. Click "done" and the resulting conversion will be displayed in the "Result Value" field.
The \"Snowflake\" in the toolbar opens up the temperature conversion menu, and the same instructions above apply.
